Accurate Weather Forecast & Widget

Brief

Accurate Weather is your one-stop mobile tool for everything meteorological. This beautifully designed app brings you the latest weather updates, from hourly to weekly forecasts, for locations around the globe. Leveraging your phone's GPS and network, it locates you automatically or allows for manual entry of any city worldwide, be it from the towering skyscrapers of New York City to the serene landscapes of Oceania.
